title: This Charming Trinity Style Home in the Heart of Philadelphia!
description:
This charming trinity style home in the heart of Philadelphia's vibrant Bella Vista neighborhood is now available for rent. This well kept one bedroom, one bathroom townhome boasts tons of character throughout. Featuring one room per floor with a spacious eat-in kitchen with access through the sliding glass doors to shared outdoor area. Upstairs on the second floor is a full bathroom with tub shower and down the hall is a nicely sized room that can be used as a second bedroom or the living/entertainment area. title: Spacious and One of the Best Apartment Buildings in Philadelphia!!
description:
The Metropolitan apartments in Center City, Philadelphia stand tall in the center of Philadelphia's historic skyline. Designed by French architect Louis Jallade in the 1920s, this twin-tower apartment building showcases 26 stories of Art Deco elegance and has a prominent history as the former Philadelphia YMCA Armed Forces Building. Before being transformed into the Center City apartment building it is today, The Metropolitan was home to United States servicemen during World War II. Today, The Metropolitan is recognized as one of the best apartment buildings in Philadelphia. You will find a spacious studio, 1-, 2-and 3-bedroom apartment rentals. As well as amenities that include a lounge, gym, basketball court and a rooftop with a gorgeous view of the City Hall and Love Park. The Metropolitan apartments feature original limestone details, terra-cotta tiles, and hand-carved cornices. Fall in love with restored architectural details and contemporary amenities, including renovated kitchens with luxurious personal touches.

Down the hall you will find a bathroom and large closest, before entering the huge bedroom, which best provides access to your large, enclosed, PRIVATE back yard. The lower level is all yours as well, and here you'll find plenty of clean storage space and your own washer/dryer. This is an absolutely unbeatable location; a beautiful, walkable neighborhood with quick and easy access to University City and Center City. Highly desirable Greenfield school catchment. Too many local favorites and locations within walking distance to list -- Schuylkill River Trail, Fitler Square, Rival Bros Coffee, Amazon Hub Locker, to name a few. Your rent includes water, tenant responsible for all other utilities.
2612 South St #1
